templateOverride.head:
<style>
  .body {
    background: white;
  }

  h1 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 24px;
    font-weight: bold;
  }

  .header, .footer {
      padding: 10px 30px;
  }

  .padding-top {
      background: #f5f5f5;
      padding: 12px;
  }
</style>

mjml.footer:
<mj-wrapper css-class="blue-footer" background-color="#1E3652" full-width="full-width">
    <mj-section background-color="#1E3652" padding="20px">
        <mj-column>
                <mj-text align="center" color="white">My Footer</mj-text>
        </mj-column>
    </mj-section>
</mj-wrapper>
mjml.head:
<mj-attributes>
    <mj-all font-family="Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" />
    <mj-text padding="0px" font-size="14px" color="#4c4c4c"/>
    <mj-image padding="0px" />
    <mj-wrapper padding="0px"/>
    <mj-section padding="10px 30px" background-color="white"/>
    <mj-column padding="0px" width="100%" />
</mj-attributes>
<mj-style inline="inline">
    /* styles go here */
</mj-style>
mjml.header:
<mj-wrapper css-class="header" background-color="#F6FAFF">
    <mj-section padding-top="35px">
        <mj-column>
            <mj-image src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/backend-production-librarybucket-1izigk5lryla9/c8fa99b7-d0d8-4225-8825-5ef259542665/1586288772006_Courier%20Logo%20Color@3x.png"></mj-image>
        </mj-column>
        <mj-column>
            <mj-text align="center">My Header</mj-text>
        </mj-column>
    </mj-section>
    <mj-section padding-top="35px">
        <mj-column>
            <mj-divider padding="0px" border-color="#ff7473" border-width="2px"></mj-divider>
        </mj-column>
    </mj-section>
</mj-wrapper>
